sparklers.name: Sparklers
sparklers.description: Magical wands which sprinkle star dust.

firecrackers.name: Firecrackers
firecrackers.description: Exuberance a little too close for comfort.

roman-candles.name: Roman Candles
roman-candles.description: Shoots fire and is somehow still entertaining?

cherry-bombs.name: Cherry Bombs
cherry-bombs.description: So loud and yet still popular...

helicopter.name: helicopter
helicopter.description: Spins very fast. Goes very high.

oil-fountain.name: Oil Fountain
oil-fountain.description: Teenager drops  ice cube in boiling oil. Warning: can cause legit explosiong/fire!

flaming-candle-holder.name: Flaming Candle-holder
flaming-candle-holder.description: Teenager plays with fire in your home. Warning: Can cause fires

sad-marshmellow.name: Sad Marshmellow
sad-marshmellow.description: A marshmellow neglected by a campfire

bonfire.name: Bonfire
bonfire.description: A group of overly exciteable humans gathers in your back yard and sets fire to sundry items.

fireworks-display.name: Fireworks Display
fireworks-display.description: Humans explode things in your night sky with total disregard for amount of noise.

solar-eclipse.name: Solar Eclipse
solar-eclipse.description: Sun hides but falsely. You decide whether to stare at it and hurt your eyes.

comet-rides.name: Comet Rides
comet-rides.description: Spaceship is attached to comet and whisked at light-defying speeds through universe

star-shower.name: Star Shower
star-shower.description: Fairies catch star sneezes and sprinkle them on Earth.

best-day-ever.name: Best Day Ever!
best-day-ever.description: No loud noises or bursts of uncontrolled flame bother you.
